channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CrowdStrike's Big Mystery: How Bad, and for How Long?
item.description: The cybersecurity providerâ€™s second-quarter results might shed limited light on fallout from the global outage caused by its minor software update.

item.title: Here's why you must keep the faith in Nvidia even if this week's earnings fail to wow
item.description: Nvidia's release on Wednesday won't make it the most important day of the year even as so many think it will be.

item.title: Big-Bank CEOs Like to Wield Influence---Except in Presidential Politics
item.description: Top bankers weigh in frequently on issues from immigration to tariffs, but they almost never contribute directly to presidential campaigns.

item.title: 2 big tests ahead will determine if last week's stock market excitement was warranted
item.description: Wall Street takes back-to-back weekly gains and an overbought market into an important week.

item.title: Pay Your Rent, Get 2% Cash Back: Landlords Join Craze for Rewards
item.description: Renters cash in points for colored pencils and get $15 a month for paying rent on time.

item.title: Cava earnings beat estimates as restaurant traffic climbs nearly 10%
item.description: The Mediterranean restaurant chain Cava said its fiscal second-quarter traffic climbed 9.5%, bucking industry trends.

item.title: Valvoline Can Be a Slick Addition to Your Portfolio
item.description: With its transformation into a pure retail operation only last year, Valvoline is continuing to increase market share and efficiency.

item.title: Peloton shares soar 35% as turnaround plan takes hold, losses shrink
item.description: Peloton has been working to generate free cash flow and return to profitability, and has made cuts to sales and marketing budgets to improve its balan...

item.title: How a Colorful Investor Profited From a Crypto Giant's Dealmaking
item.description: Christian Angermayer introduced Tether to companies in which he held stakes, and took cuts of some of the deals.

item.title: Bavarian Nordic shares pop over 13% on earnings beat, bumper mpox vaccine order
item.description: Shares of Danish biotech company Bavarian Nordic jumped Thursday after reporting first-half earnings and a bumper mpox vaccine order.
